title: Irresistible Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['150g margarine, softened', '150g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '220g light brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '425g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '120g chopped pecans', '300g plain chocolate chips']
